title: LF a Gold Support for a duo Bot lane
body:
Hey Guys,

I'm looking for someone to grind through gold with would prefer a support so we can duo bot lane,  main adc but can play solo lanes aswell. Would prefer to have voice comms and my discord is the same as my league ID.

Send me a message either way.

replies.body: [This guy here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/eUcffYQB-zilean-support-main) is a Zilean Support main Looking for gold ranked ADC mains that want to climb.
